DataElement.preferredName: Adverse Event Response Description Present Status PostAdverseEventStatus
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Any unfavorable or unintended symptom, sign, or disease including an abnormal laboratory finding) temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure.  Such events can be intervention related, dose related, route related, patient related, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s).:Any act or phenomena, or behavior, constituting a reply or reaction of a living organism or its part to some foregoing stimulus or agent.:A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something._Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.:A condition or state at a particular time._The current status of the adverse event.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Adverse Event Response Description Present Status
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any unfavorable or unintended symptom, sign, or disease including an abnormal laboratory finding) temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure.  Such events can be intervention related, dose related, route related, patient related, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s).:Any act or phenomena, or behavior, constituting a reply or reaction of a living organism or its part to some foregoing stimulus or agent.:A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something._Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.:A condition or state at a particular time.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any unfavorable or unintended symptom, sign, or disease including an abnormal laboratory finding) temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure.  Such events can be intervention related, dose related, route related, patient related, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s).:Any act or phenomena, or behavior, constituting a reply or reaction of a living organism or its part to some foregoing stimulus or agent.:A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.

Concepts.definition: Any unfavorable or unintended disease, sign, or symptom (including an abnormal laboratory finding) that is temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure, and that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure. Such events can be related to the intervention, dose, route of administration, patient, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s).
Any act or phenomena, or behavior, constituting a reply or reaction of a living organism or its part to some foregoing stimulus or agent.
A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.

Property.preferredDefinition: Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.:A condition or state at a particular time.

Concepts.definition: Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.
A condition or state at a particular time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 8/5/12 - Released as part of caAERS v2.0 model cleanup.  jc

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The current status of the adverse event.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Remain in force or carry on without letup; keep or maintain in unaltered condition; exist in time or space without stop or interruption.:An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.

Concepts.definition: Remain in force or carry on without letup; keep or maintain in unaltered condition; exist in time or space without stop or interruption.

An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: One of the possible results of an adverse event outcome that indicates that the event is improving.

Concepts.definition: One of the possible results of an adverse event outcome that indicates that the event is improving.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: One of the possible results of an adverse event outcome where the subject recuperated but retained pathological conditions resulting from the prior disease or injury.

Concepts.longName: Recovered from Adverse Event with Sequelae
Concepts.definition: One of the possible results of an adverse event outcome where the subject recuperated but retained pathological conditions resulting from the prior disease or injury.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: One of the possible results of an adverse event outcome where the subject recuperated and is free of any pathological conditions resulting from the prior disease or injury.

Concepts.longName: Recovered from Adverse Event without Sequelae
Concepts.definition: One of the possible results of an adverse event outcome where the subject recuperated and is free of any pathological conditions resulting from the prior disease or injury.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: One of the possible results of an adverse event outcome that indicates that the event has not improved or recuperated.

Concepts.definition: One of the possible results of an adverse event outcome that indicates that the event has not improved or recuperated.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An organizational header for concepts representing mostly abstract entities.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A condition or state at a particular time.

Concepts.definition: A condition or state at a particular time.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/13/12 - Released as part of caAERS v2.0 model cleanup; VD associated with CS/CSI.  jc
